member.name: T:BlowfishNET.BlowfishECB
member.summary: Blowfish ECB implementation.
member.remarks: Use this class to encrypt or decrypt byte arrays or a single block with Blowfish in the ECB (Electronic Code Book) mode. The key length can be flexible from zero up to 56 bytes.

member.name: F:BlowfishNET.BlowfishECB.MAX_KEY_LENGTH
member.summary: The maximum and recommended key size in bytes.

member.name: F:BlowfishNET.BlowfishECB.BLOCK_SIZE
member.summary: The block size in bytes.

member.name: F:BlowfishNET.BlowfishECB.pbox
member.summary: Runtime p-box.

member.name: F:BlowfishNET.BlowfishECB.sbox1
member.summary: Runtime s-box #1.

member.name: F:BlowfishNET.BlowfishECB.sbox2
member.summary: Runtime s-box #2.

member.name: F:BlowfishNET.BlowfishECB.sbox3
member.summary: Runtime s-box #3.

member.name: F:BlowfishNET.BlowfishECB.sbox4
member.summary: Runtime s-box #4.

member.name: F:BlowfishNET.BlowfishECB.block
member.summary: Single block cache.

member.name: F:BlowfishNET.BlowfishECB.isWeakKey
member.summary: 1 if a weak key was detected, 0 if not and -1 if it hasn't been determined yet.

member.name: M:BlowfishNET.BlowfishECB.Initialize(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Resets the instance with new or initial key material. Allows the switch of keys at runtime without any new internal object allocation.
member.param: The buffer with the key material.
Position at which the key material starts in the buffer.
Size of the key material, up to MAX_KEY_LENGTH bytes.

member.name: M:BlowfishNET.BlowfishECB.#ctor
member.summary: Zero constructor, properly initializes an instance. Initialize afterwards to set up a valid key!

member.name: M:BlowfishNET.BlowfishECB.Invalidate
member.summary: Deletes all internal data structures and invalidates this instance.
member.remarks: Call this method as soon as the work with a particular instance is done, so no sensitive translated key material remains. The instance is invalid after this call and usage can lead to unexpected results!

member.name: M:BlowfishNET.BlowfishECB.RunSelfTest
member.summary: To execute a selftest.
member.remarks: Call this method to make sure that the implemenation is able to produce valid output according to the specification. This should usually be done at process startup time, before the usage of this class and its inherited variants.
member.returns: True if the selftest passed or false is it failed. In such a case you must not use the cipher to avoid data corruption!

member.name: M:BlowfishNET.BlowfishECB.EncryptBlock(System.UInt32,System.UInt32,System.UInt32@,System.UInt32@)
member.summary: Encrypts a single block.
member.param: The high 32bit word of the block.
The low 32bit word of the block.
Where to put the encrypted high word.
Where to put the encrypted low word.

member.name: M:BlowfishNET.BlowfishECB.DecryptBlock(System.UInt32,System.UInt32,System.UInt32@,System.UInt32@)
member.summary: Decrypts a single block.
member.param: The high 32bit word of the block.
The low 32bit word of the block.
Where to put the decrypted high word.
Where to put the decrypted low word.

member.name: M:BlowfishNET.BlowfishECB.Encrypt(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Encrypts byte buffers.
member.remarks: Use this method to encrypt bytes from one array to another one. You can also use the same array for input and output. Note that the number of bytes must be adjusted to the block size of the algorithm. Overlapping bytes will not be encrypted. No check for buffer overflows are made.
member.param: The input buffer.
Where to start reading in the input buffer.
The output buffer.
Where to start writing to the output buffer.
The number ob bytes to encrypt.

member.name: M:BlowfishNET.BlowfishECB.Decrypt(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Decrypts single bytes.
member.remarks: Use this method to decrypt bytes from one array to another one. You can also use the same array for input and output. Note that the number of bytes must be adjusted to the block size of the algorithm. Overlapping bytes will not be decrypted. No check for buffer overflows are made.
member.param: The input buffer.
Where to start reading in the input buffer.
The output buffer.
Where to start writing to the output buffer.
Number ob bytes to decrypt.

member.name: M:BlowfishNET.BlowfishECB.Clone
member.remarks: Cloning can be very useful if you need multiple instances all using the same key, since the expensive cipher setup will be bypassed.

member.name: F:BlowfishNET.BlowfishECB.PBOX_INIT
member.summary: The P-box initialization data.

member.name: F:BlowfishNET.BlowfishECB.SBOX_INIT_1
member.summary: The first S-box initialization data.

member.name: F:BlowfishNET.BlowfishECB.SBOX_INIT_2
member.summary: The second S-box initialization data.

member.name: F:BlowfishNET.BlowfishECB.SBOX_INIT_3
member.summary: The third S-box initialization data.

member.name: F:BlowfishNET.BlowfishECB.SBOX_INIT_4
member.summary: The fourth S-box initialization data.

member.name: P:BlowfishNET.BlowfishECB.IsWeakKey
member.summary: To check if the key used is weak.
member.remarks: If a key is weak i means that eventually an attack is easier to apply than just a simple brute force on keys. Due to the randomness in the key setup process such a case however is unlikely to happen, yet checking after each setup might still be the preferred way. In the case of a weak key detected a simple recreation with a different key (or just a different salt value) is the recommended soltution. For performance reasons we don't do the weak key check during the initialization, but on demand only, and then only once to determine the flag.

member.name: T:Ecrion.Ultrascale.ServerDocumentTemplate
member.summary: ServerDocumentTemplate represents a XSL or XFD template installed in a remote instance of XF Rendering Server. Server templates are managed on remote XF Rendering Server instances using the Management Console.

member.name: M:Ecrion.Ultrascale.ServerDocumentTemplate.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of a server template using the template identifier.
member.param: The template ID configured in the XF Management Console on the server.

member.name: M:Ecrion.Ultrascale.ServerDocumentTemplate.#ctor(System.String,System.Collections.Hashtable)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of a server template using the template identifier and a set of parameters.
member.param: The template ID configured in the XF Management Console on the server.
Pairs of key/values that must be used during the transformation.

member.name: M:Ecrion.Ultrascale.ServerDocumentTemplate.#ctor(System.String,System.Collections.Hashtable,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of a server template using the template identifier, a set of parameters and a language identifier.
member.param: The template ID configured in the XF Management Console on the server.
Pairs of key/values that must be used during the transformation.
When the template is an XFD (XF Designer) layout template, this parameter specifies the language used for translations.

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.ServerDocumentTemplate.TemplateID
member.summary: A string that uniquely identifies a server template. It must be specified as "applicationname:templatename" where template name includes the file extension (usually xfd, xsl, xslt). This parameter will be used only when is .

member.name: T:Ecrion.Ultrascale.LocalDocumentTemplate
member.summary: LocalDocumentTemplate represents a XSL or XFD template available locally to the client .NET application. Ecrion.Ultrascale.NET.dll will combine XML data with the template and will send the resulting XSL-FO or HTML to the server. The server will process this input and will return back a PDF document (or any other supported output format).

member.name: T:Ecrion.Ultrascale.LogLevel
member.summary: Various logging levels.

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.LogLevel.None
member.summary: No logging is performed.

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.LogLevel.Errors
member.summary: Only errors are logged.

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.LogLevel.ErrorsAndWarnings
member.summary: Only errors and warnings are logged.

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.LogLevel.AllExceptTrace
member.summary: All except tracing information,

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.LogLevel.All
member.summary: Everything is logged, including tracing information. Use this setting for troubleshooting purposes only.

member.name: T:Ecrion.Ultrascale.LogSettings
member.summary: Logging settings.

member.name: P:Ecrion.Ultrascale.LogSettings.LogFile
member.summary: Gets or sets the file name that will receive the log's content. The default location is "C:\Documents and Settings\All Users\Application Data\Ecrion\Log" on Windows 2003 and earlier and "C:\ProgramData\Ecrion\Log" on Windows Vista and later.

member.name: P:Ecrion.Ultrascale.LogSettings.LogFileName
member.summary: If LogFileName specified GetDefaultLogFile will use LogFileName instead of AssemblyName

member.name: P:Ecrion.Ultrascale.LogSettings.LogLevel
member.summary: Gets ot sets the log level. If no is already specified, a default location will be assigned.

member.name: T:Ecrion.Ultrascale.RenderingParameters
member.summary: Contains all parameters needed to configure a rendering operation.

member.name: M:Ecrion.Ultrascale.RenderingParameters.#ctor
member.summary: Constructor for RenderingParameters class

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.RenderingParameters.ServerPort
member.summary: The server port used by XF Ultrascale service to listen for requests. Default value is 1099.

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.RenderingParameters.Server
member.summary: The server name or IP address used to perform the conversion. XF Ultrascale must be installed and listening on the port specified by . Default value is "127.0.0.1", that is, the local computer.

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.RenderingParameters.RetryFailedRequests
member.summary: Retry the request when an error has occurred. The default is false.

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.RenderingParameters.RequestTimeout
member.summary: Specifies the amount of time after which a request will time-out. The time-out value is measured in seconds and must be greater than 0. The default value is 0, which indicates an infinite time-out period.

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.RenderingParameters.UserName
member.summary: The user name used to authenticate this request. Leave blank if you want to run under the Guest account.

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.RenderingParameters.Password
member.summary: Password used to authenticate this request. Leave blank if you want to run under the Guest account.

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.RenderingParameters.OutputFormat
member.summary: The output format

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.RenderingParameters.BaseUrl
member.summary: Base URL for relative paths

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.RenderingParameters.InputBytesID
member.summary: This string identifies the stream of input bytes and is logged into the server log files. It is not used by the engine in any way during processing and does not affect the output but it is very useful in troubleshooting requests that fail or to monitor server performance. It should be set to the name of the current input file (like 'c:\statement.fo') or any other string (like 'Customer:281928,Statement:1/1/2009'.

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.RenderingParameters.OutputBytesID
member.summary: This string identifies the stream of output bytes and is logged into the server log files. It is not used by the engine in any way during processing and does not affect the output but it is very useful in troubleshooting requests that fail or to monitor server performance. It should be set to the name of the current output file (like 'c:\statement.pdf') or any other string (like 'CustomerID:281928,PDF Statement'. Do not include any customer identification information (like names or social security numbers).

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.RenderingParameters.ReferenceResolverType
member.summary: Specifies options for resolving references(page-number-citation, page-number etc.) Default value is Engine.ReferenceResolverType.Parallel.

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.RenderingParameters.PreloadDocument
member.summary: When set to true, all repeated content(footer, static-content) can be placed anywhere in the document. (Note! Progressive parsing will be disabled which in turn will lead to an increased memory usage.) Default value is false.

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.RenderingParameters.AutoLayoutRowCount
member.summary: When performing automatic tables layout, the engine will by default look only at a limited number of rows. You can set this to -1 to use all table rows, however this may drastically affect the performance if your document has very large tables. The default value is 100.

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.RenderingParameters.ImageErrorsHandlingMode
member.summary: Controls the engine's behavior whenever an image is not found.

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.RenderingParameters.PerformLayout
member.summary: Enables/disables layout when resolving compatibility issues between XSLFO input format and HTML/EPUB/WordML output format. Layout will improve quality but will decrease rendering speed. Default is true(layout enabled).

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.RenderingParameters.ComputePageCountOnly
member.summary: Compute and get page count based on input stream; no output will be rendered but will contain the number of pages for this document.

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.RenderingParameters.CompressionAlgorithm
member.summary: Specifies compression algorithm for TIFF output. Default value is None.

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.RenderingParameters.ZoomFactor
member.summary: The scaling factor that will be applied to the raster output. The value has to be greater than 0. Default value is 1. Values between 0 and 1 will scale down the image (zoom out), while values above 1 will zoom in. For example. a value of 0.5 is equivalent to a 50% zoom, while 2 is equivalent to a 200% zoom.

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.RenderingParameters.XResolution
member.summary: Horizontal resolution for raster (TIFF, JPEG, etc.) and AFP output. Default value is 0, that is, the resolution will have the default value for the specified . For AFP output the default value for horizontal and vertical resolutions is 144 (1440 DPI).

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.RenderingParameters.YResolution
member.summary: Vertical resolution for raster (BMP, JPEG, etc.) and AFP output. Default value is 0, that is, the resolution will have the default value for the specified . For AFP output the default value for horizontal and vertical resolutions is 144 (1440 DPI).

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.RenderingParameters.SmoothingMode
member.summary: Specifies the type of smoothing (antialiasing) that is applied to images. This parameter affects image output formats. Default value is SM_Default.

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.RenderingParameters.ImageTransparentBackground
member.summary: Enables/disables image transparency background. Default is false (disables image transparency background).

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.RenderingParameters.ImageScaleWidth
member.summary: Sets the width rescaling factor. Default is -1 (Both ImageScaleWidth and ImageScaleHeight must be set for rescaling to work).

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.RenderingParameters.ImageScaleHeight
member.summary: Sets height rescaling factor. Default is -1 (Both ImageScaleWidth and ImageScaleHeight must be set for rescaling to work).

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.RenderingParameters.PageIdx
member.summary: The page index to render; meaningful only for JPEG / GIF / PNG / SVG output.

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.RenderingParameters.AFPOutputFlags
member.summary: Default value is 0, that is, system wide options configured in the Management Console will be used.

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.RenderingParameters.PDFOutputFlags
member.summary: Specifies options for generating PDF output. Default value is 0, that is, system wide options configured in the Management Console will be used.

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.RenderingParameters.PDFOutputPermissionFlags
member.summary: Specifies permissions flags for encrypted PDF output Default value is 0, that is, system wide options configured in the Management Console will be used.

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.RenderingParameters.PDFEncryptionStrength
member.summary: Password encryption strength for encrypted PDF output. Valid values are 128 and 40.

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.RenderingParameters.PDFUserPassword
member.summary: The user name used to encrypt PDF output. This parameter affects only PDF output format.

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.RenderingParameters.PDFOwnerPassword
member.summary: The password used to encrypt PDF output. This parameter affects only PDF output format.

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.RenderingParameters.PDFImageCompression
member.summary: Specifies image compression for PDF output. This parameter affects only PDF output format. Default value is JPEG compression.

member.summary: Specifies settings for HTML input.

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.RenderingParameters.IsLastDocumentInMergeContext
member.summary: If set to true, the merge context will be closed after this rendering operation.

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.RenderingParameters.MaxMergeContextInactivityTTL
member.summary: The TTL (Time To Live) for an inactive merge context, in seconds. The merge context will be automatically discarded by the server after the specified period of inactivity. Default value is 120 seconds.

member.name: T:Ecrion.Ultrascale.Engine.AFPFlags
member.summary: AFP output flags

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.Engine.AFPFlags.UseNativeRasterFonts
member.summary: Use AFP native raster fonts.

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.Engine.AFPFlags.UseNativeOutlineFonts
member.summary: Use AFP native outline fonts instead of raster fonts.

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.Engine.AFPFlags.UseTTFFonts
member.summary: Use TTF fonts instead of native AFP fonts.

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.Engine.AFPFlags.EmbedNonNativeFonts
member.summary: By specifying the TTF fonts will also be embedded in the generated output.

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.Engine.AFPFlags.WriteSentinels
member.summary: Write 0x5A sentinels between AFP records.

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.Engine.AFPFlags.ConvertColorsToGrayscale
member.summary: If this flag is set all colors will be converted to grayscale using RGB, Patters or Highlight colors.

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.Engine.AFPFlags.UsePatternsForGrayscale
member.summary: If this flag is set, gray colors will be generated using patterns. If neither or are set, gray colors will be generated using RGB triplets.

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.Engine.AFPFlags.UseHighlightForGrayscale
member.summary: If this flag is set, gray colors will be generated using highlight colors. If neither or are set, gray colors will be generated using RGB triplets.

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.Engine.AFPFlags.AutoRotateLandscapePages
member.summary: If this flag is set a 90 degrees rotation will be applied to those pages that have their width greater than their height.

member.name: T:Ecrion.Ultrascale.Engine.PDFFlags
member.summary: PDF output flags

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.Engine.PDFFlags.PDF14
member.summary: PDF1.4 is default PDF conformance.

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.Engine.PDFFlags.PDFX
member.summary: The document will be PDF/X-1a:2003 conformant.

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.Engine.PDFFlags.PDFA_1A
member.summary: The document will be PDF/A-1a:2005 conformant.

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.Engine.PDFFlags.PDFA_1B
member.summary: The document will be PDF/A-1b:2005 conformant.

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.Engine.PDFFlags.PDF508
member.summary: The document will be conformant with Section 508.

member.name: T:Ecrion.Ultrascale.Engine.PDFPermissionFlags
member.summary: PDF Permissions Flags

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.Engine.PDFPermissionFlags.AllowPrinting
member.summary: The document will be allowed to print.

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.Engine.PDFPermissionFlags.AllowModifyContents
member.summary: The document will be allowed to modify its contents.

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.Engine.PDFPermissionFlags.AllowCopy
member.summary: The document will be allowed to copy.

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.Engine.PDFPermissionFlags.AllowModifyAnnotations
member.summary: The document will be allowed to modify its annotations.

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.Engine.PDFPermissionFlags.AllowFillIn
member.summary: The document will be allowed to fill its forms (if any).

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.Engine.PDFPermissionFlags.AllowScreenReaders
member.summary: The document will be allowed to be read by Acrobat Reader.

member.name: T:Ecrion.Ultrascale.Engine.ImageErrorsHandlingMode
member.summary: Controls the engine's behaviour whenever an image is not found.

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.Engine.ImageErrorsHandlingMode.ThrowError
member.summary: An error is thrown.

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.Engine.ImageErrorsHandlingMode.Ignore
member.summary: No error is throw, the engine behaves like the no image was specified.

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.Engine.ImageErrorsHandlingMode.IgnoreAndDisplayImageNotFound
member.summary: The default behaviour; a stock image is used for those images that can't be found.

member.name: T:Ecrion.Ultrascale.Engine.CompressionAlgorithm
member.summary: Specifies compression scheme for TIFF output.

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.Engine.CompressionAlgorithm.None
member.summary: Specifies no compression. This is passed to the TIFF encoder as a parameter that belongs to the compression category.

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.Engine.CompressionAlgorithm.CCITT3
member.summary: Specifies the CCITT3 compression scheme. This is passed to the TIFF encoder as a parameter that belongs to the compression category.

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.Engine.CompressionAlgorithm.CCITT4
member.summary: Specifies the CCITT4 compression scheme. This is passed to the TIFF encoder as a parameter that belongs to the compression category.

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.Engine.CompressionAlgorithm.LZW
member.summary: Specifies the LZW compression scheme. This is passed to the TIFF encoder as a parameter that belongs to the compression category.

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.Engine.CompressionAlgorithm.RLE
member.summary: Specifies the RLE compression scheme. This is passed to the TIFF encoder as a parameter that belongs to the compression category.

member.name: T:Ecrion.Ultrascale.Engine.SmoothingMode
member.summary: Specifies the type of smoothing (antialiasing) that is applied to images. This parameter affects image output formats.

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.Engine.SmoothingMode.Default
member.summary: Use system settings.

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.Engine.SmoothingMode.None
member.summary: Specifies that smoothing is not applied.

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.Engine.SmoothingMode.AntiAlias
member.summary: Specifies that smoothing is applied.

member.summary: Specifies image compression for PDF output.

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.Engine.PDFImageCompression.FLAT
member.summary: Specifies FLAT compression for images.

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.Engine.PDFImageCompression.JPEG
member.summary: Specifies JPEG compression for images.

member.summary: Specifies page height. Default value is auto.

member.summary: Specifies page margin top. Default value is 1in.

member.summary: Specifies page margin left. Default value is 1in.

member.summary: Specifies page margin right. Default value is 1in.

member.summary: Specifies page margin bottom. Default value is 1in.

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.Engine.HtmlInputSettings.PageHeaderMargin
member.summary: Specifies page width. Default value is auto.

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.Engine.HtmlInputSettings.PageFooterMargin
member.summary: Specifies page width. Default value is auto.

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.Engine.HtmlInputSettings.ShowPageNumber
member.summary: Specifies if the page number must be displayed in the footer. Default value is true.

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.Engine.HtmlInputSettings.ShowTitle

member.summary: Set parameters to default values.

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.Engine.HtmlOutputSettings.GenerateHtmlDocument
member.summary: Specifies option for generating document with html tag. Default value is true.

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.Engine.HtmlOutputSettings.UseFixedBodyWidth
member.summary: Specifies if body width will be fixed. Default value is true.

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.Engine.HtmlOutputSettings.HideStaticContent
member.summary: Specifies option for generating html document without static content. Default value is false.

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.Engine.HtmlOutputSettings.RenderedImagesBaseUrl
member.summary: Specifies the base url for rendered images from svg and xchart graphics.

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.Engine.HtmlOutputSettings.RenderedImagesOutputFolder
member.summary: The output folder where the svg and xchart graphics will be rendered as images.

member.name: T:Ecrion.Ultrascale.Engine.TxtOutputSettings
member.summary: Specifies settings for TXT output.

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.Engine.TxtOutputSettings.Encoding
member.summary: Specifies encoding of the output text files.

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.Engine.TxtOutputSettings.FontFamily
member.summary: Specifies font family used for layout text in the output.

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.Engine.TxtOutputSettings.FontSize
member.summary: Specifies font size(in points) used to layout text in the output.

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.Engine.TxtOutputSettings.LineHeight
member.summary: Specifies lineHeight used to layout text in the output. Default value is 1.4.

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.Engine.TxtOutputSettings.UseFormFeed
member.summary: Enables using form feed character between logical pages.

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.Engine.TxtOutputSettings.TrimPages
member.summary: Do not generate empty lines for the end of the page.

member.name: T:Ecrion.Ultrascale.Engine.PrinterSettings
member.summary: Specifies settings for printer.

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.Engine.PrinterSettings.PrinterName
member.summary: The printer name (Applies only when direct printing.)

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.Engine.PrinterSettings.OutputPrintFile
member.summary: Specifies the name of a PCL output file. If this parameter is empty, the output will be sent direct to the printer. Default value is empty.(Applies only when direct printing.)

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.Engine.PrinterSettings.InputTray
member.summary: Specifies the input tray from which the printer selects the paper source.

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.Engine.PrinterSettings.OutputTray
member.summary: Specifies the printer output tray.

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.Engine.PrinterSettings.CopyCount
member.summary: Specifies the copy count for a page to be multiplied when printing. -1 means not specified.

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.Engine.PrinterSettings.Duplex
member.summary: Specifies simplex/duplex printing.

member.name: F:Ecrion.Ultrascale.Engine.PrinterSettings.ManualTray
member.summary: Specify usage of the manual tray, when printing.
